website_summaries.verdict: An old-timey wooden radio with modern embellishments for the 21st century.
pros: Loved for its solid, sturdy construction of real walnut
Bluetooth enabled and comes with an aux cable for portable listening devices
If you’re looking for a small radio made of quality materials, this is your pick
cons: Keep your phone away from your speaker when using Bluetooth to avoid static

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: The picture looks really nice, but until you hold it in your hand you will not realize just how good the quality is. Their is a nice sturdy weight to this speaker. It looks even better than it does in the photos. I honestly have not tried the sound yet, but it is more for the office, so it will not be playing at a high volume anyway. You can spend maybe 20 dollars less and get something similar, but that extra 20 is going to get you a nice speaker that is more durable that the other light plastic stuff out there. It is really sharp looking, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as a Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful little radio. As a radio it sounds awesome. As a Bluetooth speaker it doesn't work at all. If you can get it to pair and stay paired, the sound is weak and full of static. I could never get it to stay paired to my phone. I bought it mostly to use as a radio and I am very pleased with the sound quality when it's used as a radio. It is well made and very appealing. Bottom line, if you want a retro radio that has solid sound in a small attractive unit, this is a good option, but if you're looking for a Bluetooth speaker, you're better off going with a Mini Marley.
customer_reviews.author: MamaHank

customer_reviews.title: This is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the BEST buy EVER as far as the Bluetooth radios go! It fits my retro vintage decor- 1940-1950's country. It's constantly topic of discussion when friends n family come for a visit. I can have it playing quietly in the background or really loud if the kids and I are cleaning and need some fun music to listen to. It plays loud enough to be heard clearly throughout our 2 story home. I hesitated to buy because of the price, but I gambled and I have NO regrets! The sound is crisp, the wood is NOT pine...I hate pine! The size of it is perfect! It's small but definitely packs great sound!
customer_reviews.author: Vega

customer_reviews.title: Makes an awful noise whenever it is on.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product, but makes a terrible sound at all times it is on. I tend to keep my music on relatively low so I can work and do things while it plays in the background, but the music was distorted by this awful sound the speaker would make. The speaker is beautiful - a bit smaller than I had anticipated, but I do not mind that. I am giving it a 1-star because it does not do the very thing it is designed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Z,J,D&andD, a Family Co.

customer_reviews.title: The Silence of the Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically, it fits really well in the space, but unfortunately, after only a couple uses, I noticed some issues with bluetooth connectivity. It would begin to play a song via bluetooth, then randomly cut off, and not continue until pressing play back on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: earth_to_erin

customer_reviews.title: Sudden & Unexpected Break on the Power Switch
customer_reviews.text: Oh.. so cute mini radio speaker! Radio reception is good, sound is good, but not for the bluetooth which I found it lagging behind in both sound and connection. It doesn’t matter as I bought it for the radio not for the bluetooth function. Update on 12 August 2018: I bought 2 units of this radio with very light use, both having the same issue that last only 3 months before a sudden and unexpected break on the Power Switch. Horrible quality, it is way too expensive, not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Fernando Lée

customer_reviews.title: Spend your money elsewhere!
customer_reviews.text: This thing had great potential. The look is there, but functionality is poor and sound is also poor. Spend your money elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but very small, mediocre sound quality
customer_reviews.text: First, as others have pointed out, this is very small--fits in the palm of your hand. See the user photos. Second and most important, the sound quality is far inferior to other much lower cost Bluetooth speakers. I really wanted to keep this, but at the current price I didn't feel it was worth it and instead kept the Oontz Angle, which at less than half the price, sounds far better.
customer_reviews.author: Random Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Small but Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Don't be surprised when you open the box. This radio is only about the size of your palm...but! It's super cute and has good overall sound. We put ours in a basement bedroom, so weren't expecting much reception-wise. We were happy to pick up several of our stronger stations with clarity. Bluetooth paired well with clear sound. Volume adjusted nicely. My husband likes to listen to music while he falls asleep each night so he really likes the light-up dial. Would give one more star if it were just a little bit bigger since it is so nice to look at. (That would also make it easier to turn the knobs.)
customer_reviews.author: Jody Kapp

customer_reviews.title: Very 'tinny" sounding
customer_reviews.text: If you are picky about audio quality, you will not like this. Very cool looking but no bass. As the volume goes up, the sound quality goes down. Might be good for podcasts. Very nice construction, however.
customer_reviews.author: FindPrimal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Design
customer_reviews.text: Super late review because I rarely use it.. Design wise, this thing is gorgeous. Absolutely beautiful. Old school vibe with modern functionalalities. The sound is loud and really good. My problem is the bluetooth. I think mine has a problem but its definitely too late to send mine back. I see it's also out of stock now. Anyway, I can still use the radio and the sound is really good. Also, there aren't ang ugly cables coming out that serve as an antenna so that's good.
customer_reviews.author: Myrjam Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Love this beautiful radio 📻
customer_reviews.text: This little AM/FM radio is the bees knees!! I got it since I’ve been working from home for going on eleven years now. But I don’t do a lot of telephone calls so I needed a white noise and keeping up with the news since we don’t have cable television. Especially during these trying times. I’ve had it for two weeks now and I have not charged it yet. I use it about 2-3 hours a day. I love this thing. It was a little expensive for it, but after having it for 2 weeks it was an investment in my mental health. And it motivates me to produce more work a day so a positive!!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Price exceeds value by far
customer_reviews.text: Was seriously disappointed with this speaker, sure the retro look is cute but the sound distortion at high volumes makes it have as poor sound as a glorified tape player from the 90s. The 8 watts just isn't enough. It also doesn't get nearly as loud as other Bluetooth speakers that are half it's pricetag or even just 25% of the pricetag of this one, I'll be returning it immediately, don't waste your money, there are great wooden speakers out there but this isn't one of them sadly
customer_reviews.author: Bc

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre speaker, mine had static on the bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: The speaker had a tendency to pick up weird static when on Bluetooth. Nothing awful but annoying enough I ended up buying something else for myself and giving this to my mother whose hearing is bad so she didn't notice the static. We both love the way it looks and it is nice to have a neat little portable radio with a long battery life but given the price and the minute nature of the static issue it didn't seem worth bothering the manufacturer to get it repaired or replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Redimus

customer_reviews.title: Great little radio, but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little radio, my husband and I loved the portability and the look; the sound is fine -- BUT. Unfortunately, it began working only with headphones after a couple of months and now has stopped working altogether. I sent an email to the support address listed, but have received no response. I sent a second email this morning. UPDATE: (changed from one to three stars) Postive response to second email, they are sending a new radio. Will update again when it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: fl

customer_reviews.title: Cute retro piece with great sound !
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smaller, dazzling radio to fit in with my boyfriends designer decor & this is it! I got the package same day as I needed the radio with some urgency to keep my dogs company when we’re gone during the day . It came in a jif, fired up right away, Fm radio tunes in like a gem! It’s as described & super adorable . I hope the charge on it will hold out & will change my review if it doesn’t. I also think that $60’for the cost is pushing it, I had to suck it out because I was in a pinch but normally I wouldn’t spend more than $40! Great find though 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Very Dark Walnut
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed ,how dark brown it is. Much darker then photos of the product. My own fault I guess. Thought it would match my table and chair set that is Oak, just by the lighter color in the photo . Did not realize how mismatched it would be. It does say Walnut,which is a dark wood but did not click until I seen mine which is a dark dark brown. Sounds good,but will probably return it .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, well-made radio!
customer_reviews.text: Very well-made with beautiful sound! The radio comes in loud and clear and picks up dozen more stations than the other radios that I have. The charge lasted 14.5 hours right out of the box. The wood is gorgeous and looks exactly like the photo. I've been using it daily for at least three hours and have not had any issue with it so far. I have yet to try the Bluetooth or connecting a phone or iPod with the AUX cable but I'll update if I have any difficulties or errors. ((I'll also add photos later.))
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Updating my review
customer_reviews.text: I wrote my review before I had spent more time with it. As it turns out, while I was listening to some downloaded music, (Queen), the background vocals could not be heard at all. I tested it on several other songs and it did the same thing. So, I use my Bose bluetooth for my music, and this one for my radio listening. On that, this bluetooth is better than the antenna radio I was using! It works best backed into a corner for sound quality too. I still like it and will keep it, but was disappointed it didn't accommodate stereo sound . . . unless I'm doing something wrong?
customer_reviews.author: Judith T.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Even Last 18 Months
customer_reviews.text: It was great, connected to my phone while I worked. The connectivity kept cutting out each time I had a call or a text message. Then, after an email disconnected the bluetooth, the thing stopped connecting (and making the connecting/blue tooth sound). The stupid thing works, but not for the purpose that I purchased it: to play my own music. Who listens to am/fm anymore? Piece of crap. Buy a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, well made, not as loud as I'd like
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it looks - it's really well made. It also holds a charge for a really, really long time. I can go days without recharging it. We use it in the morning before school and while I'm cooking dinner each night. I sometimes use it during the day to listen to audiobooks. The only critique I have is that it just isn't as loud as I'd like it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Dori

customer_reviews.title: Great buy if you don’t need the carrying bag and expect to plug in to power!
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat little Bluetooth radio that works well , but don’t be mislead by the ad describing it . The Ad says you get a carrying bag, well , you won’t .The description says it operates via ac or rechargeable battery, it doesn’t, it does not have ac , only rechargeable battery. But other than the false advertising, this is a great little radio , cute too!!
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I do like the Rerii. I bought this one for myself and a Muzen for my sister for Christmas. We compared them and the Muzen blows the Rerii out of the water with sound. The Rerii is half the price. You definitely get what you pay for. This is a decent little speaker for my office at work. I will probably buy myself a Muzen next Christmas and give the Rerii to my kid.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Van Boskerk

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not very good!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed!! Wanted to love this little guy; but sound was awful !! Muffled; not clear at all. Probably bad speaker!! Not Handmade as claimed!! False advertising if I have ever seen!! Have a couple of these tiny soundboxes!! This was no better than what I have now at half the cost!! Overpriced !! Looks good!! Sound bad!!
customer_reviews.author: Razorblade

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking, Small Sounding
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking wood cabinet. Very small size, small sound and small radio reception. Looks and sounds like a nice looking, expensive toy. After trying three different bluetooth portable speakers, I had to finally admit that the Bose Soundlink Mini II is the only one that can cut it with me. Even though it has been out for over three years and is responsible for starting this whole portable speaker craze, it is still the only one that got the sound right so far. The rest of these are just cheap toys.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Great for tuning in NPR on the patio.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it. It’s a little thing, but classy. I bought it more for the am/fm tuner than anything else. I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. McGuffey

customer_reviews.title: I love this little radio / speaker!
customer_reviews.text: My wife got me this for my birthday and I use it every day at my desk. On radio the battery will go a whole work week. On Bluetooth, 2-3 days. (Using it 3-4 hours a day) My only gripe is that the line in is a shared port with USB charging, but if you search on Amazon there's a cable adapter that lets you charge and line in at the same time. Oh, and you can use the radio receiver with line out to a PC with various delay apps for listening to your local broadcasters while watching a sports game on TV!
customer_reviews.author: Corey Maddocks

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas family and friends gift
customer_reviews.text: I was so suprised when this came and I opened it. It had so many things I didn’t realize. The AMFM radiol , speakers sound great and looks so cute Sitting on my shelf. I’m ordering these for Christmas Gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This little Bluetooth speaker and radio is attractive, loud, and functional. I use it to listen to the radio and podcasts, and, for the price, the sound quality is pretty good. The Bluetooth does get some interference when my phone is too close, but overall, I’m happy with this device.
customer_reviews.author: SGC

customer_reviews.title: A wooden jewel of a radio!
customer_reviews.text: Craftsmanship isn't dead and this is a piece of that artisan tradition, a wooden jewel of a radio! The sound is astonishingly full-bodied and deep from such a small radio, exceeding expectations! The radio dial glows gently with an antique hue... a little masterpiece! If only most things were made this well!
customer_reviews.author: Ian Goddard

customer_reviews.title: Not the best but should work.
customer_reviews.text: These are my initial thoughts on this as I just got it today. Looks nice, radio stations come in good, easy to pair to Bluetooth. Sound isn't great, but not bad for an unheard of brand. Should work great for an office or small room. Am a bit disappointed that I have to supply the charger. They give you a USB cable, but may not be long enough to run to an outlet from a desk or something. But all in all seems to be a nice little radio/speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant vintage look, amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: This is a little radio that packs a punch! The radio is barely larger than a soda can, but man can it put out some sound, and amazing bass considering it's size. The wood grain is beautiful and the knobs are quality. The radio dial lights up when turned on (an unexpected surprise that really gives it an extra vintage touch). Bluetooth pairing is shockingly easy. The only drawback is that it does not come with a wall charger. It must charge through your computer (USB) or use your own plug adapter to charge in the wall. I'd definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a Bluetooth speaker/radio combo.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Brown

customer_reviews.title: So adorable and perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this radio and Bluetooth speaker. It has great sound quality and volume. It is also perfect because it blends in with any decor.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great but a few issues
customer_reviews.text: First off, the product looks and sounds great. The wood construction lends a nice aesthetic to the speaker and a decent quality to the sound. It is loud and picks up the radio pretty well without an external, extendable antenna. IT did however come with a bluetooth connectivity issue. It kept dropping my cell mid-song and then reconnecting. My advice if you have this issue? Run down the battery on the speaker and then fully charge it. Haven't had an issue since. Altogether I love this little thing!
customer_reviews.author: elias

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: A little more than I would have paid but liked the reviews! They weren’t wrong! Love this little speaker, we sit by the outdoor fire with this streaming from Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful little object, but does not perform. The radio function is actually pretty good, with above average reception and nice sound for the size. Unfortunately the Bluetooth function is a letdown. The sound is tinny with some interference in the background and it cuts in and out occasionally. The knobs are tiny and hard to turn, so I can't imagine an older person with arthritis would be able to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Guy in Philly

customer_reviews.title: If you want your news or music to move from room to room, you need this.
customer_reviews.text: This hand-sized bluetooth radio is perfect for anyone who enjoys listening to news or music as you move from room to room. It is compact but can fill the room with sound. I don't like wearing earphones for very long so unless I'm trying to not disturb others, I'd much rather listen from a source not plugged into my ear. It is easy to charge with a common USB cord. It would make a great gift for anyone who like to listen but needs a simple to use source. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Wiltgen

customer_reviews.title: Incredible speaker for size and price
customer_reviews.text: I have an expensive $300 Marshall speaker but this little guy is my most used speaker. It has great sound quality and a richness that I never expected. The only complaint is it's not stereo so old tracks from the 50's and 60's with harmonies don't play well. But for most modern music, it's great for small or larger spaces. I have found I use my Marshall speaker less and and less. I'm very happy with this and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte B.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, since it is actually bigger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: How am I suppose to say that! Just gorgeous! I advise everybody should get one, although it is a little bit expensive, but as we all know, "you pay for what you got" First is sound quality, beautiful, since it is actually bigger than I expected, the bigger the size, the better the sound quality. I just enjoy the NPR radio from this speaker, than anything else. Second, the wood quality, perfect, love it! Third, Bluetooth connection capability, give this little antique a hightech feeling.
customer_reviews.author: John Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker, love the vintage look!
customer_reviews.text: Love how this Bluetooth speaker looks! I als like that you can listen to the radio as well. Does exactly what it’s supposed to without any issue.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Louder than you'd think!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little blue tooth speaker and radio. It's never dropped connection, the battery lasts a long time before needing to recharge with the included wire and it has a great look. It's a lot nicer than I had expected. Even the packaging was really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Weber

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound for such a small device
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my wife who loves it, takes it around the house with her to listen to the radio. Sound is great for the size and had no trouble with it connecting to Bluetooth from our computer. The retro look fits in with our antique furniture. A product that met our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Mcdonnell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 👌🏼
customer_reviews.text: I friggin’ LOVE this little thing. I have it with me in the kitchen for cooking/cleaning, working in the office, laundry room, bathroom to listen while I’m in the shower. Because of the size I bring it everywhere! Nothing but compliments from others as well. Think I’ve got 4 people sold on ordering. I use it so much I do have to charge it often. Will be ordering another one soon just to keep in my classroom. The only complaint is that I wish I could listen to a podcast or sirusxm.
customer_reviews.author: Cassi Bohl

customer_reviews.title: good volume, easy to link to your phone
customer_reviews.text: I've brought this to a bridal shower I hosted, a rehearsal dinner my mother hosted, and keep it prominently displayed in my house. Friends, family, even my older aunts and uncles have asked me for the link and where to find one. Quality sound, good volume, easy to link to your phone. Great for a gift, or to treat yourself.
customer_reviews.author: EMILY CROCKER

customer_reviews.title: Extremely deceptive ad
customer_reviews.text: The photo on the site for this item makes the radio look MUCH larger than it actually is. Seems to work fine, however since it was purchased for an elderly person, the teeny tiny size makes it almost impossible for him to see the dials, much less read what they say
customer_reviews.author: Nina O

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: cheap crap. So many better sounding speakers for the money like ONTZ or JVC clip. I thought the wood would help it resemble authentic sound, but it sounds just like a speaker that was made in the 30s and 40s.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hyatt

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but DOA
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely little wood radio BUT, it was DOA. This item does not run on batteries, and I could not get it to charge. After a lengthy conversation with the product tech line it was determined that it was a defective unit and could be returned and money refunded. This radio is very small and lightweight and could prove to be a problem for those who want a size and weight more stable. Appearance-wise it is a beautiful wood item, but functional-wise, didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Robert and Jo Anna Oldani

customer_reviews.title: 👉Gotta get this one!!👈
customer_reviews.text: Was really delighted when I listened to this little gem. I was truly surprised at the sound quality from such a small radio. I connect the Bluetooth to my favorite talk station and take it anywhere in the apartment. Would recommend it to anyone who likes superior quality radio at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Barry L. Garbrick

customer_reviews.title: Great reception!
customer_reviews.text: Great reception for living in the Cascade mountains! I live over 40 minutes from the nearest city, amd this little box has great recepion! Love the design - wish it was twice the size, though with direct electric plug in option.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R. Rasavage

customer_reviews.title: Oh My, This Is The Best
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a whim and I didn’t realize this was missing from my life! I use this radio everyday to listen to the morning sports talk while making lunches and getting my kids ready for school. Pretty low power consumption in radio mode, I go for a week or more before charges. Also, I left it out in a summer rainstorm once and it survived so I’m really happy with it’s durability.
customer_reviews.author: John Cliver

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and works great
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker/radio is exactly what I was looking for in my construction trailer office. Amazing how well the radio works! It could use an antenna though. No big deal though. I use it more for the bluetooth hook up to my phone. Everyone that sees this, wants one just like it. The wood case is very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda K

customer_reviews.title: Worked Really Well First Couple of Days...
customer_reviews.text: I was all set to give it a 5-star review but this morning the low static started when it was on Bluetooth. I checked other reviews and it appears to be a common problem. When it first arrived it was awesome - sound was crystal clear and I loved the size, the look, the feel of the wood. I’m actually sad it’s not performing properly...wish there was a fix :(
customer_reviews.author: C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! I’m going to use this in my vintage 1957 trailer. Has fm/am and Bluetooth. Fm radio works great! Haven’t used am radio. Bluetooth works well but it’s not loud! I have a 200.00 Bluetooth speaker which is awesome but this little Bluetooth has a much lower volume sound. It’s comparable to a speaker in the 50.00$ range so remember that.
customer_reviews.author: Annaken

customer_reviews.title: This speaker is perfect
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is perfect. It’s really well made and looks better in person. I love vintage looking items and this one really fits that style. The sound quality is amazing. I was hesitant to buy it because of the price, but I’m really happy I did. It looks amazing and sounds amazing. I’m am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DawnTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to using this Summer
customer_reviews.text: Cool little radio , I needed a f.m. Radio for the Drive in , so the grandkids could set outside of the car. Plus it’s good for Pick nicks I am looking forward to using it this Summer.
customer_reviews.author: GEM

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker looks so cool and is of very high quality. I love the old school touch this piece of hardware has, right down to the "clickiness" of the dials. The quality of sound is pretty good, but wish it could get a little louder.
customer_reviews.author: dezymondTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't produce much volume, and the sound quality for the money was very disappointing. Unless you just love the design and have to have this "look," I'd buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little speaker. It is cute, compact, and has a great battery life. The speaker is a good quality for its size. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: K Pieper

customer_reviews.title: Compact but powerful stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Its design is awesome, and I'm extremely satisfied with the tactile of its wooden body :). Besides, the radio function is quite easy to use. Although the performance of bass is not impressive, it can still give me comfortable experience. At last, I really recommend this product for its fluent connection, lasting battery, high-quality speaker, and all that jazz.
customer_reviews.author: GAOXIHCEN

customer_reviews.title: Static when not playing
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous Speaker. The sound is well balanced, though flattens out at high/low volumes. My big qualm: I bought this to replace an Oontz Angle that had starting making high-pitched static sounds when nothing was playing. This does the same thing. It’s not quiet when it’s on but not playing. Oh well. Next time I’ll finally suck it up and buy a Bose Soundlink Mini.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Meelan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and simple. FM radio works lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Aw! So happy with this cute little thing. Was able to tune into the station I wanted right away. Beautiful construction. Small, but I wanted small and it's as advertised. I haven't tried the Bluetooth yet, but am less interested in that feature anyway. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia E Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I ABSOLUTELY love this radio
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY love this radio. It is simply beautiful and sounds great. The battery lasts a VERY long time. I still haven't charged it yet and I have been using it everyday for the last two months. It is a little expensive for what it does, but the style, and craftsmanship it has definitely makes it worth. It is sometime nice to go ahead and pay a little extra for something that is also beautiful and will be enjoyed more.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my husband who is addicted to sports radio. It’s impossible to find something with AM that has good reception and doesn’t look like it should be on a fishing boat. Or it was impossible till I found this little beauty. And it’s loud! Lucky me! (Haha)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not loud enough
customer_reviews.text: At least from Bluetooth play; sound from iPhone bt play sound is rather low. Radio sound is a bit louder. Also after a year of usage, sometimes it looses bt connection or audio cuts off. Radio reception is subpar probably because lack of external antenna. Definitely feels overpriced for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian F. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Hissing in Bluetooth Mode, Poor Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I love the styling of this little radio. It receives FM signals well in our community. However, there is an audible hiss in Bluetooth mode that interferes with the playback of any music, especially classical. I contacted the sales service department since the radio is still under warranty, but have received no response. If your main intent is to use Bluetooth (as mine was), I would steer clear of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Athanasius

customer_reviews.title: Cute Compact Speaker
customer_reviews.text: As a wireless speaker it is top notch. As a display item it is very good looking. As a radio the stations are very limited. So far I cannot get any FM and a handful of AM. I intend to keep it as i needed the Speaker feature more than a radio. Have not attempted working it with a battery.
customer_reviews.author: Workamper

customer_reviews.title: Adorable radio and great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Adorable radio and great sound quality. We're in love with this thing, and so small--you can take it to the park or from room to room so easily. A big improvement from just listening to stuff on your phone. Bluetooth function works well, and if you play your podcasts on it instead of your phone it's so disorienting--sounds like a real old-timey radio show. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful radio, nostalgia and modern combine!
customer_reviews.text: We love this product, the sound is very good, my husband wanted it to listen to during baseball games, however now we are using it all of the time. The look fits in with our modern decor nicely, it gives a hint of nostalgia, and we love it. Its so easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good, easy to use. I love the look and feel. The nostalgic sound of the on/off switch and the light of the dial make me feel warm and fuzzy. Plus, it's so useful with bluetooth. My only (super picky) complaint is the blue color of the light to the left of the aux/bluetooth/am/fm switch. I wish they would have made it a bit more subtle like the rest of the design.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: I love this speaker/radio!
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a similar Bluetooth speaker that was much more expensive when I came across this Rerii speaker. I love it! It has a beautiful, warm tone, and the AM/FM radio is a great bonus. It’s also beautifully made. I’m so pleased with my purchase and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: MandySu

customer_reviews.title: So I didn't dislike it enough to send it back but I probably wouldn't buy it again knowing what I know now
customer_reviews.text: I guess it was OK. It is a lot smaller than I expected but I suppose that means I didn't read the description very well. The sound quality seems OK but I can't get the FM to receive very many stations. So I didn't dislike it enough to send it back but I probably wouldn't buy it again knowing what I know now
customer_reviews.author: Lyndon Irwin

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little speaker!! It has surprisingly great warm tone to it. I had trouble with Bluetooth with my 1st unit, but the seller replaced it for me very promptly. Greatly appreciated. I highly recommend this little unit.
customer_reviews.author: Supayalat

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly good!
customer_reviews.text: Shocked at how good the sound quality is in this little radio. Also as this is a Chinese made product, I am wondering what the durability of this product is because I have only had it a few months (that is, when do the odd problems begin that will make me want to throw it out the window!!)
customer_reviews.author: CL of Detroit

customer_reviews.title: great radio!
customer_reviews.text: For such a little radio it has great sound, loud, and the radio transmission is clear, unlike our scratchy old radio that was much bigger and had a bigger antennae. It also lasts quite a while on one charge.
customer_reviews.author: ARead

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little radio
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews and was skeptical, but finally caved cause I just loved the look. I bought it cause I loved that it is wood instead of plastic that looks like wood. The sound quality is awesome and when I use the Bluetooth it definitely makes anything I listen to on my phone sound better, especially a baseball game. Also don’t get fooled by the pictures of it in different surroundings, but they do show the measurements. (Metric)
customer_reviews.author: Mordecai

customer_reviews.title: Radio is small but sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: Love this radio. Blue-tooth works great. Radio is small as others have said, but the neat thing is you can put this radio almost anywhere. Sound is very good. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: William O.. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Portable radio
customer_reviews.text: Long battery life! Has worked well for over a year. We use it Bluetooth and radio features. It’s small enough to travel with us also
customer_reviews.author: Jess Lima

customer_reviews.title: Nifty little device
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for my mother. She wanted a radio she could use when she was on the porch or backyard. I liked the fact that it was rechargeable and easy to use. I wasn’t aware of the bluetooth feature till afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Swervin

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot!!!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great, and the very portable. I used this whenever I work on the yard and on travel. I will buy it again. I'm very satisfied with my purchased. The only thing is not very polish like the picture indicated but I still great.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Quinto

customer_reviews.title: the reception on the radio is poor. I live in Metro Atlanta and I can ...
customer_reviews.text: Speaker is not very loud at all, switches are small and hard to grab. Once you do grab them to turn them moves the speaker. the reception on the radio is poor. I live in Metro Atlanta and I can get two stations. I guess I thought it was bigger, but I was wrong. Very small and not very good sound quality. Would have returned it but I missed the return window by one day. I bought another speaker for half the price that out performs this one in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC SPEAKER
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected BUT this speaker is gorgeous, well made, and great sound quality
customer_reviews.author: amazonchik

customer_reviews.title: Awesome All Around!!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is wonderful! The sound is great! The battery lasts for days! The range is really good and the design is cute! Great little speaker!!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Cool Retro Rafio
customer_reviews.text: Really nice classic radio. give it to my dad for Christmas the pictures are a little deceiving smaller that appears in pictures am fm with good sound
customer_reviews.author: Calicat

customer_reviews.title: loses connection randomly like the song is 'skipping'
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet! loses connection randomly like the song is 'skipping'. Definitely not going to work for what I wanted. It's cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Lalajean2187

customer_reviews.title: Great looks and sounds excellent.  Would buy again in a second!
customer_reviews.text: Love this good looking little radio. Real wood construction and a rich tone. Tuner picks up all local stations in Chicago area. Rechargeable feature is awesome too !
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Truxal

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable retro look gives you a nostalgic feel. Cute, but smaller than I imagined. Ample sound, and I adore the am/fm feature. Real wood, which I'm really happy about. Decent quality. I feel that I got my money's worth. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality! Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and neatly packaged in a soft pouch. High grade wood. Works very well. Of course not a Bose, but it is fine for a desktop unit and tasteful decor--works with about every decor.
customer_reviews.author: D.E.A.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! So vintage, perfect size! I haven't used the USB port yet, but it's not overly loud with blue tooth. Love the look!!! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: So so.
customer_reviews.text: First issue, you can't charge it and connect a device to it thru the cable. Second issue, you get some static when you connect the Blu tooth. And it has one speaker and it does not balance the sound very well. Other than that, the radio works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No regrets.
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful, good quality. Works with my bluetooth and the radio (what I predominately bought it for) is awesome. It's made really well and is the perfect little size to fit on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my dad's 62nd birthday and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: but this little thing is amazing! it sounds great
customer_reviews.text: I seldom writet reviews, but this little thing is amazing! it sounds great, the radio reception is very good, the Bluetooth function is perfect for Pandora or Spotify from my iPad, it’s small and it looks pretty! I have a small retail shop and have struggled with dysfunctional speakers,wires, old iPhones and bad sound for years. I am extremely happy with the quality of this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jan paul

customer_reviews.title: A very high quality product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. The product performs its tasks well, it draws admiring comments, and my interactions with their technical support garners them my highest praise.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is really poor. Radio reception is also poor so if you are not in a big city, don't expect much from that. Controls are not that easy to turn and getting it out and back into the box to return is almost impossible without ruining the box. I wouldn't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: SherylinColorado

customer_reviews.title: Attractive speaker
customer_reviews.text: The speaker was a gift to us and we love it. It's attractive to sit on a counter, sound is good, nice to have AM Radio in the house again.
customer_reviews.author: Meewa

customer_reviews.title: Buzzing in the speaker
customer_reviews.text: It's an attractive and easy-to-use device, but, as others have noticed, there is a distinct buzz in the speaker when it's paired with my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift for my husband. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband. He uses the Bluetooth a lot and loves it. He really likes the style because it’s different than the other Bluetooth radios he’s seen.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Knapp

customer_reviews.title: phone or ipod cord and a really nice travel bag that feels waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I can see what other reviewers are saying about it not being the most high quality sound. But for such a tiny thing it does have a big, warm sound and the radio is strong, which is exactly what I was looking for. It blends in with the furnishing of my tiny home perfectly. Came with usb cord, phone or ipod cord and a really nice travel bag that feels waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: jujuu

customer_reviews.title: Good fun product, looks great with ok sound.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the product. It’s fun, looks great with a unique and interesting appearance, and perfect for my office. Gave it 4 stars because we have about 8 Bluetooth speakers and the sound/bass could be better. But overall, a decent product especially for the office.
customer_reviews.author: CAP

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound and Wood Enclosure
customer_reviews.text: The radio is well worth the cost in sound quality, simplicity and looks. This is the second one purchased for our place.
customer_reviews.author: Louie J Swalby

product_meta.title: Rerii Retro Bluetooth Speaker, Handmade Walnut Wood Vintage Small Bluetooth Radio FM AM, Portable Wireless Speakers for Home and Office
feature_bullets: The retro bluetooth speaker is beautifully finished and crafted by natural walnut wood. And it is handmade. It is warm colored and vintage appearance small radio, which matches seamlessly with the texture of your wood furniture around your house. The size this Bluetooth radio is 135(L) * 60.5(W) * 79.5(H) MM (foot pad exclusive)

The sound of the vintage radio Bluetooth speaker is clear and crisp for this exquisite wooden. It’s bass, mid and high range frequencies are all good.The volume control range is broad enough to fill a large room or office. Suitable for playing light music, such as Folk Rhyme, Jazz and more. This small radio is both AM and FM. Very nice for daily use.

The retro Bluetooth speaker equipped with 4.0 bluetooth system for easy and fast pairing, which only takes few seconds to connect to smart phones, tablets, iPads or computers either with bluetooth-enabled devices. It is nice as both home speakers or office speakers.

This Bluetooth small radio is with long playtime. The compact, wood retro bluetooth speaker features "Charge less, Listen More". With Built-in rechargeable 2200mAh lithium battery, approximately 15 hours battery life for playing music on a single charge. For radio, it can work more than one week. Standby Time: About 1 Month.

FM AM small radio, the retro bluetooth speakers radio supports FM and AM radio. You are free to listen some radio stations at any time. The enclosed micro USB cable can also acts as an antenna to get good radio reception

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars431 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
